name: digi-dash
description: Unified Digital Dashboard with role-based authentication

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:login" "npm run dev:student" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:teacher" "npm run dev:parent" --names "LOGIN,STUDENT,ADMIN,TEACHER,PARENT" --prefix-colors "cyan,green,red,yellow,magenta"
scripts.install:all: npm --prefix apps/login install && npm --prefix apps/student-primary install && npm --prefix apps/student-middle-school install && npm --prefix apps/student-university install && npm --prefix apps/ADMIN-DB install && npm --prefix apps/teacher-dashboard install && npm --prefix apps/Parent install
